channel.title: Khasck Revolution - Hiring
channel.description:
Welcome!
I Am Working On A New Server, A 70% Lagg Free Server, But With All The Addons Still.
It Is Based On Nothing, Mostly Written From Scratch, And I Am Looking For Afew Coders To Help Me.
So Far I Have: Working Gnome Gliders New Shops Silab Items Fishing Herblore Mining Rune Crafting (Money) Wood Cutting (Money) Prayer Smithing Theiving All Old Spells, Including New Created Ones. Working Dark Bow (Partially) Silab Item Bonus' ----------------------------------------- Now, I Need Afew Things, To Make This Server Perfect.
Here Is A List Of Things I Need: ----------------------- New Lunar Spells? To Fix The Trading Bug To Fix The Login Error (White Screened) Finish The Dark Bow (Double Hit) Finish All Specials Cooking Slayer Bug Fletching Farming Fire Making Crafting Atleast One Quest And Afew More Little Things -----------------------------------
Now, I Will Probably Need 1 Coder Per Problem, But If You Can Do More Then One, Thats Great.
Application:
------------------------------------ I Would Like To Code: (Some Thing On The List) I Have Coded For: (However Long) I Am Known For: (Accomplishments) My Name Is: (Your Real Name) My Server Name Is: (Your Usual Server Name) ------------------------------------
Now, As For Payment, Co-Owner Will Go To Whoever Helps The Most. Admin Will Go To Those Who Fix Big Things. Mod Will Go To Others Who Help.
Please Post Below.
I Will Be Running My Test Server Later On In The Day, On KittyScape.no-ip.biz Port 43594 If You Are Not Sure About Coding, Come On, And Look Around On The Server.
-Liam

item.title: Khasck Revolution - Hiring
item.dc:creator: @Liam1 Liam-
item.description:
@Liam1 wrote:

Welcome!

I Am Working On A New Server, A 70% Lagg Free Server, But With All The Addons Still.

It Is Based On Nothing, Mostly Written From Scratch, And I Am Looking For Afew Coders To Help Me.

So Far I Have:
Working Gnome Gliders
New Shops
Silab Items
Fishing
Herblore
Mining
Rune Crafting (Money)
Wood Cutting (Money)
Prayer
Smithing
Theiving
All Old Spells, Including New Created Ones.
Working Dark Bow (Partially)
Silab Item Bonus’

Now, I Need Afew Things, To Make This Server Perfect.

Here Is A List Of Things I Need:

New Lunar Spells?
To Fix The Trading Bug
To Fix The Login Error (White Screened)
Finish The Dark Bow (Double Hit)
Finish All Specials
Cooking
Slayer Bug
Fletching
Farming
Fire Making
Crafting
Atleast One Quest
And Afew More Little Things

Now, I Will Probably Need 1 Coder Per Problem, But If You Can Do More Then One, Thats Great.

Application:

I Have Coded For: (However Long)
I Am Known For: (Accomplishments)
My Name Is: (Your Real Name)
My Server Name Is: (Your Usual Server Name)

Now, As For Payment, Co-Owner Will Go To Whoever Helps The Most.
Admin Will Go To Those Who Fix Big Things.
Mod Will Go To Others Who Help.

Please Post Below.

I Will Be Running My Test Server Later On In The Day, On KittyScape.no-ip.biz Port 43594
If You Are Not Sure About Coding, Come On, And Look Around On The Server.
